sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; const AboutUs: React.FC = () => (

About Us

Vulnerability Scanner is an open-source project dedicated to providing easy-to-use tools for basic security testing and education. Our goal is to help users understand and improve their security posture through accessible scanning features and a modern, user-friendly interface.

This project is for educational and authorized testing purposes only. Please use responsibly and only on systems you own or have explicit permission to test.

Our Team

[Add team member names, roles, or a brief description here.]

); export default AboutUs;
